full_summary:
**[Tender Announcement]** Insect Pheromone Identification
=====================================================

**Reference:** PW-22-01005844

**Solicitation Number:** 01R11-23-C053

**Publication Date:** 31 August 2022

**Tender Closing Date:** 14 September 2022, at 15:00 hours

This advance contract award notice (ACAN) indicates that Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada intends to award a service contract to Simon Fraser University for insect pheromone identification.

**Summary of Requirements**

The contractor will identify and synthesize the sex pheromones of pestiferous click beetle species for the Agassiz Research and Development Centre. The contractor must have expertise and experience in insect physiology and behavior, as well as analytical and synthetic chemistry, and specialized equipment for electrophysiology, chemical structure analysis, and pheromone synthesis.

**Contract Period and Estimated Value**

The contract period will be from contract award to 31 March 2023, with an option to extend for one year. The estimated value is $52,500 CAD (taxes included).

**Pre-Solicitation Notice**

This notice is intended to inform the supplier community that Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada intends to award a contract to a pre-identified supplier, Simon Fraser University. Interested suppliers may submit a statement of capabilities to indicate their interest in bidding. The statement of capabilities must clearly demonstrate how the supplier meets the requirements set out in the notice.

**Statement of Capabilities**

The closing date and time for acceptance of statement of capabilities is 14 September 2022, at 14:00 hours. Suppliers who consider themselves fully qualified and available to provide the services described herein may submit a statement of capabilities by email to the contact person identified in this notice.

**Contact Information**

* Name: Camille Sobczak
* Email: [camille.sobczak@canada.ca](mailto:camille.sobczak@canada.ca)
* Phone: 204-430-5426
* Address: 400-303 rue Main, WINNIPEG, MB, R3C 3G7

**Note**

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. The contracting authority reserves the right to proceed with the award to the pre-identified supplier if no other supplier submits a statement of capabilities that meets the requirements. However, if a statement of capabilities is received, the contracting authority will proceed with a full tendering process
